description: Retrieve facts for a device using SNMP.

username.description: Username for SNMPv3, required if version is v3

privacy.description: Encryption algorithm, required if level is authPriv

level.description: Authentication level, required if version is v3

community.description: The SNMP community string, required if version is v2/v2c

authkey.description: Authentication key, required if version is v3

version.description: SNMP Version to use, v2/v2c or v3

integrity.description: Hashing algorithm, required if version is v3

privkey.description: Encryption key, required if version is authPriv
